title: Macworld Podcast: What you should know before buying a Vision Pro
content:
Macworld

The dawn of spatial computing is coming as the Apple Vision Pro is about to go on sale. Are you ready to buy one? We talk about what you need to know before investing in the Vision Pro, on this episode of the Macworld Podcast!   

This is episode 869 with Jason Cross, Michael Simon, and Roman Loyola.
